website_summaries.verdict: A smaller version of the 12-cup percolator for smaller households with the same excellent “perks.”
pros: Brews piping hot coffee in about 5 minutes
Stainless-steel filterless basket is dishwasher safe for easy cleaning
Small and doesn’t take up a lot of space
This electric model doesn’t require you to attend to it (vs. stove top)
"Keep warm" mode automatically switches on after brewing to keep the coffee warm
Makes an aromatic, excellent cup of coffee
cons: Complaints of the base losing heat
Brews more like 2, 8-ounce cups than 4 cups

product_meta.title: Farberware Percolator 4 Cup Stainless Steel 1000 W
product_meta.description: Size:4-CUPThe Farberware 2 to 4 Cup Percolator quickly brews at cup-a-minute speed for coffee in no time. Once the brewing is complete, the percolator automatically switches to "keep warm" temperature. Stainless steel construction offers durability and the detachable cord makes for easy serving. Rolled edges offer safe handling as do the stay cool handle and cover knob. Measures 7 x 7 x 10 inches.
feature_bullets: Automatically switches to Keep Warm temperature
